resources.string:
The rules of Rock, Paper, Scissors are as follows: 
1. Pick a hand of either rock, paper, scissors, lizard or spock 
2. The computer will choose a hand 
3. the hands are compared. 
Paper beats rock and spock, 
rock beats scissors and lizard, 
lizard beats spock and paper, 
spock beats rock and scissors, 
and scissors beats lizard and paper. 
The same hand draws.
